keyword: how many calories in a bag of popcorn
title: How Many Calories in a Bag of Popcorn?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a bag of popcorn, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and variations for microwave or theater styles.
h1: How Many Calories in a Bag of Popcorn?
assumptions: Standard microwave popcorn bag (butter flavor, ~100g popped, 3 servings), prepared as directed with included oil/butter.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, flavor, serving size, and preparation method. Check packaging for exact values.

quick_answer.text: A typical bag of microwave popcorn contains about 420 calories and 60g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a bag of microwave popcorn?
faqs.a: About 420 calories for a standard butter-flavored bag.

faqs.q: Is popcorn low calorie if air-popped?
faqs.a: Yes, a bag of air-popped popcorn has around 120 calories, mostly from carbs.

faqs.q: What makes popcorn high in sodium?
faqs.a: Added salt and butter flavors; a bag can have up to 990mg sodium.

faqs.q: How much fat in a bag of popcorn?
faqs.a: Typically 24g total fat for buttered microwave popcorn, including 12g saturated.

faqs.q: Does caramel popcorn have more calories?
faqs.a: Yes, a bag of caramel popcorn can exceed 600 calories due to added sugars.
